page.title: 16A NEW HOUSING ESTATE part 2
page.content: They use concrete,sand,wood,glue, plasterboard,about 2,700litres of water and about 15,000 bricks for every large house. They need planners,architects, ground workers,bricklayers,plumbers, electricians,joiners,painters,and tilers amongst others. On this estate of 68 houses there are 23 different types, all detached except for a block of 11 terraced houses.The average size of the main rooms is about 4m by 4m.The houses cost from about Â£35,000 to Â£130,000. Barrat's think that in the future houses will be smaller with features like roofs that open, solar panels on the roofs and walls,swimming pools under folding floors,and most equipment computerised and automatic.
